data.text: I like coffee and tea ... She is small but strong ... Do you prefer chocolate or vanilla? ... I was tired, so I went to bed early ... I study hard because I want to pass.

I want to go; however, I have to work ... He was late; therefore, he missed the bus ... I don't want to go; moreover, I'm busy ... I like the city; on the other hand, I love the countryside too ... In conclusion, we need to act now.
